snippet: John Cale, the experimental-rock pioneer, is presiding over two programs at the Brooklyn Academy of Music: one a tribute to Nico, one a performance of his album “Paris 1919.”
abstract: Experimental rock pioneer John Cale discusses two programs he is hosting at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, which include tribute to singer Nico and performance of his own 1973 album Paris 1919.
lead_paragraph: John Cale, the experimental-rock pioneer, is presiding over two programs at the Brooklyn Academy of Music: one a tribute to Nico, one a performance of his album “Paris 1919.”

headline.seo: John Cale at Brooklyn Academy of Music
headline.main: An Eclectic Rock Pioneer Traversing the Borderline
headline.print_headline: An Eclectic Rock Pioneer Traversing the Borderline
